en-US.name: Fork On The Road
en-US.summary: Spin the "Fork On The Road" to help you make a decision.
en-US.description: Looks like you need some help making a decision. Let the "Fork On The Road" be your guide. Add up to four things for the fork to choose from. Then spin the fork to choose your path.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Fork On The Road
Alexa, start Fork On The Road
Alexa, play Fork On The Road

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say, start Fork On The Road.  Add up to 4 things for the fork to choose from. Then spin the fork to choose your path.
